title: Can't See Player Icon In Boards?
body: I can't see it. I feel like I'm banned.

replies.body: It's just a sync issue that happens sometimes when you change your icon. A bunch of players have it at the moment so it makes me think it might be related to the new patch as well (not pulling summ icons properly). It'll fix on it's own dw.
Oh ok thanks man I was so scared I got banned {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
